title: User can create new release from player history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Release of a Minor League Player” under the “Create New” button
custom_expected: THEN a new Preliminary Release for the player will open in edit mode

title: BOC approving a release terminates the players MJC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a player that was recently outrighted to the minor leagues and has an active major and minor contract
AND there is a release for a minor league player
custom_expected:
THEN the player’s current major contract status updates to “Terminated”
AND Contract status on contract will say “Terminated”

title: BOC can reject the release
custom_preconds: GIVEN a release is in the “Submitted to BOC” state
custom_expected:
THEN the status will be moved to “Rejected”
AND any approval item on the approvals clipboard is removed
AND player’s pending org and club is reversed
AND player’s pending MJR and MNR statuses are reversed
AND the entry is removed from the player history

title: User can submit a transfer to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I have a transfer created
AND the Submit to BOC button is available
custom_steps: WHEN I click Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update the status of the transaction to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the transaction into view mode
AND submit notification will be displayed “the transaction has successfully been submitted” in blue

title: BOC Can reject a transfer tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in a Transfer transaction status is “Submitted”
custom_expected:
THEN the transfer transaction status is updated to “Rejected”
AND players Pending org and club will be reversed
AND pending Major and Minor league status will be reversed
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard

title: BOC Can approve a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a transfer transaction state is Preliminary, “Submitted to BOC”, or Rejected
custom_expected: THEN the transaction status is updated to “Approved”

title: BOC can create declare FA tx from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I am on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Create New” in the multi-level selection, selecting Free Agency, Declare Minor League Free Agent
custom_expected: THEN the Declare Free agent form should open

title: BOC Can approve a declare FA tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND in view or edit mode of FADML tx
custom_expected:
THEN Update Player's Player History with: Code = FADML, Description = Declared a Minor League Free Agent in black text
AND sets MJR or MNR status to “Free Agent”

title: Approving a declare FA tx should update players org and club
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
custom_expected: THEN the system sets the player’s org and club to null

title: Create new Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to a Player History Widget
AND Player has no existing loan tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'create new'
AND Transaction>Minor>Assignment>Loan
custom_expected: THEN New Loan tx loads

title: Submit a Loan tx to a Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to a preliminary or rejected loan tx
AND 'mexican league' is NOT selected
AND submit is available in edit/view mode
AND submit button is blue for club/grey for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user click 'submit to club'
custom_expected:
THEN rule checks run
AND status changes to 'submitted to club'
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification displays
AND action item appears in user clipboard
AND tx hyperlinks work in widget

title: Submit a Loan tx to the BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary or rejected loan tx
AND 'mexican league' is selected
AND submit is available in edit/view mode
AND submit button is blue for club/grey for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit to BOC'
custom_expected:
THEN system runs a rule check
AND status updates to 'submitted to BOC'
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification appears
AND system sets player's pending org/club to that of the tx
AND Flags/comments/files appear in approval widget properly
AND hyperlinks work in widget
AND tx appears in green font in player history

title: Club rejects Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a submitted to club loan tx
AND reject button is available in grey in both edit/view modes
custom_expected:
THEN rules are checked
AND status updates to 'rejected'
AND successful reject notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND reverse pending org/club
AND remove from player history

title: BOC approves Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary, submitted to club, submitted to BOC or a Rejected Loan tx
AND approve button is in blue
custom_expected:
THEN form reloads in view mode if not already in view mode
AND successful approve notification appears
AND Item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND system sets player org/club by the "Loan to" field
AND new entry found in player history

title: BOC rejects Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a submitted loan tx
AND reject button is available in grey in both edit/view modes
custom_expected:
THEN rules are checked
AND status updates to 'rejected'
AND successful reject notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND reverse pending org/club
AND remove from player history

title: Create new Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to a player's history widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new>transaction>MJ>assignment>return
custom_expected:
THEN system checks for existing return tx
IF return tx already exists, system will open that in view mode UNLESS preliminary, then in edit mode
AND new tx follows wireframe and DD

title: Submit Return tx to a Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a preliminary or rejected tx
AND 'mexican league' is NOT selected
AND is in edit OR view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks submit to club (blue for clubs, grey for BOC)
custom_expected:
THEN system run rule checks
AND status is updated to submitted to club
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND item appears in action item widget
AND hyperlinks work

title: Submit Return tx to BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has preliminary or rejected tx
AND 'mexican league' is selected
AND is edit OR view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit to BOC (blue for clubs, grey for BOC)
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status is updated to submitted to BOC
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND player's pending org/club is updated
AND Player history is updated
AND approval item populates in approvals widget
AND files/comments/flags show in widget
AND hyperlinks work

title: BOC user approves Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a transaction (in view or edit mode) in Preliminary, Submitted to Club, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status is updated to approved
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals widget
AND player's org/club is updated
AND player's history is updated

title: BOC user rejects Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a transaction in edit/view mode in submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND successful notification appears
AND status updated to rejected
AND item is removed from approval widget
AND player's org/club is reversed
AND entry in player history is removed

title: Club user rejects Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted to club tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND Status updates to rejected
AND successful notification displays
AND approval item is removed
AND player's org/club are reversed
AND player history entry removed

title: BOC create new NES tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigates to a player's history widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks create new "place player on NES list" tx
IF preliminary/rejected tx exists from past 10 days
OR submitted tx exists
custom_expected:
THEN new tx opens
OR existing tx opens in edit mode
OR existing tx opens in view mode
AND tx follows wireframe/DD

title: BOC approves NES list tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status updated to approved
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful blue notification appears
AND updates player history
AND updates player's MJ/MN roster status

title: BOC reversing Free Agent tx un-expires MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an Approved FA tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks reverse on tx
custom_expected:
THEN MNC will unexpire
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.

title: BOC user reversing a release transaction to un-terminate any minor league contracts that were terminated as a result of the release being approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an approved release tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unterminate" any minor contract that was marked Terminated as a result of the approval of the transaction. 
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.
